thread.title: Ariana Grande Is a Final Fantasy Character Now
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande Is a Final Fantasy Character Now

author: Matt Porter
title: Ariana Grande Is a Final Fantasy Character Now
text:
Pop singer Ariana Grande will soon have a character based on her own likeness featured in Final Fantasy: Brave Exvius, a mobile game which was released last year. 
Posting to Instagram , Grande shared an image of her sitting in a room full of men in suits as she checked out her character on a phone. "It's the cutest thing I've ever seen in my entire life and I'm so excited and in love with it I cannot contain myself," she said. 
Grande also posted some video of her character in action . It appears she'll have a dark helmet with large rabbit ears attached, and of course, she'll be singing a lot. In addition, Grande has also posted an image of her dressed as her own character . 
Continue readingâ€¦
